name: MEC Revy Mitts - Unisex
description:
Warm ski mitts ready for Revy, Whistler or wherever else the snow leads you. They have synthetic insulation to keep them warm and ready for shredding. Pre-curved fingers are designed with ski-poles in mind, and details like removable keeper cords and one-handed cinches make for fewer dropped gloves and fast on-the-hill adjustments.Main fabric is recycled polyester with a waterproof-breathable membrane.Fast drying Tricot lining wicks moisture.Layered polyester insulation is 360g weight on the back of hand, 200g on the palm side.Grippy palm material has a leather-like feel and won't soak through.Removable keeper cords.One-handed hook-and-loop cuff tabs for fast adjustments.

        Sustainability
